name: Fruit Jewels Match 3
description:
Introducing Fruit Jewels Match 3 the coolest Match 3 game ever.Enjoy the smooth & impressive Graphics. Compete in the game with arcade mode or play the old fashion classic game. Compete your friends for top score & show them your match skills .

Your mission is to win Fruit Jewels Match 3, pass the levels and move to next level.


Features of Fruit Jewels Match 3

* Impressive & Smooth Graphics on Fruit Jewels Match 3
* Leader-board Support so you can compete with your friends now for top score.
* Special power fruits & Bombs to make the game more interesting.
* 12 different levels on arcade mode to compete
* Different modes like arcade & classic for fruit Jewels Match 3 game
* Lesser number of ads that annoy Gamer's
* No full page ads , you can just keep on playing without getting disturbed. 
* Two different modes of play , Play it the way you like.

HOW TO PLAY:

- Swap jewels to match 3 or more identical fruit jewels and eliminate them.

- Use the bombs to make a splash effect or the fire fruit to burn the whole line.

- Try to achieve target score to move to the next level.

- Finally make your way to the top of scoreboard.
